title: DISCORD CAUSES FPS DROPS !!!!
body:
So I was playing league after a couple of days and I saw that I had fps drops for no reason (I've got a I7-6k and a gtx-1060 they don't cause the problem).

I was looking for a solution because I reinstalled it and I had still those fps spikes but suddenly after I closed discord it disappeared (I'm going to write a sup-ticket to Discord so that they can explain it to me.)

But in the end I want to say IF u have drops and u have discord close it and look if it disappears, if this happens comment it please so that I can say that I'm no they only one with that kind of problem

Thank you for your attetion
Merokz :)

replies.body: I've got the same problem.. other problem is, I wanna communicate with my friends.
I'm using teamspeak at the moment but it's just not the same as discord :/
When i play with open discord, Sometime i have high pings. But no FPS drops---

I've got a good connection so that's not my problem but thanks ^^
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
